originalText.text: Zach Zachariadis was such a pleasure to work with. Renting in NYC can be such a stressful experience (all the documentation, time limits, requirements, etc), but Zach made it smooth and manageable. He's professional, extremely responsive, adaptable and accommodating. He relates to you like a human being and goes out of his way to make things work for you. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better real estate agent than Zach Zachariadis. They exceeded my expectations and made the real estate transaction a positive and rewarding experience. I highly recommend Zach to anyone in need of a dedicated and knowledgeable real estate professional.

text.text: Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better real estate agent than Zach Zachariadis. They exceeded my expectations and made the real estate transaction a positive and rewarding experience. I highly recommend Zach to anyone in need of a dedicated and knowledgeable real estate professional.

originalText.text:
This has been the BEST EXPERIENCE I have had with a real estate agent, whether it was buying a home or renting apartments (mostly overseas.) The service and support I received was definitely world-class. Thank you, thank you, thank you! And thank you for personally calling my daughter to inform her she was approved

My brilliant daughter (who will be a graduate student at NYU Tisch this Fall) and I spent no less than four hours a day for the past 10 days searching [online] for apartments, making phone calls to "student housing buildings," dealing with other agents, submitting applications, etc.

We learned some hard lessons along the way. We got outbid and outmaneuvered. Our character got overlooked - and we actually started to feel unworthy.

I appreciate the NYC rental market is really tough right now - too much demand and little inventory. I want to just express my sincere appreciation and gratitude to Zach for his assistance in the process. I don't doubt he received hundreds of inquiries on this apartment. But, he treated us like we were genuinely his personal client. He walked us through the process. We were able to pull the necessary documentation together along with our applications to apply.

He is conscientious, pleasant, extremely helpful, positive, and a straight-shooter.

originalText.text: Zach is absolutely incredible. He made my time in NYC super seamless, which is hard in such a hectic city with wishy washy agents and supers. Whenever anything was wrong in the apartment, Zach answered right away and made sure we were taken care of immediately. Zach was always honest and true to his word. Highly recommended !

text.text: Zach is absolutely incredible. He made my time in NYC super seamless, which is hard in such a hectic city with wishy washy agents and supers. Whenever anything was wrong in the apartment, Zach answered right away and made sure we were taken care of immediately. Zach was always honest and true to his word. Highly recommended !

originalText.text: It’s hard to put into words how genuine, helpful, friendly, and communicative Zach has been throughout our process of looking for an apartment. My husband and I started our apartment hunt in the peak of summer 2022 when housing inventory in NYC was at an all-time low, and prices were exorbitantly high. Zach found us an incredible apartment in Astoria. Due to unforeseen circumstances, the apartment was not available when it was supposed to be. Zach did an excellent job of working with the management company and not only keeping us up-to-date, but also advocating for us during every step of the way. His approachability and dedication to his clients are what make him a stand-out realtor. We are very grateful for Zach’s work, and HIGHLY recommend him to others.
